title.raw: 《伍子胥列傳》 Biography of Wu Zixu

sentences.zh: 伍子胥者，楚人也，名員。

translations.literal: Wu Zixu was a Chu man, named Yuan.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Zixu was a man from Chu, named Yuan.

sentences.zh: 員父曰伍奢。

translations.literal: Yuan's father was named Wu She.
translations.idiomatic: Yuan's father was named Wu She.

sentences.zh: 員兄曰伍尚。

translations.literal: Yuan's elder brother was named Wu Shang.
translations.idiomatic: Yuan's elder brother was named Wu Shang.

sentences.zh: 其先曰伍舉，以直諫事楚莊王，有顯，故其後世有名於楚。

translations.literal: His ancestor was named Wu Ju, who served King Zhuang of Chu with upright remonstration, gained prominence, therefore his descendants were famous in Chu.
translations.idiomatic: His ancestor was named Wu Ju, who served King Zhuang of Chu with upright remonstration and gained prominence. Therefore his descendants were famous in Chu.

translations.literal: Wu Zixu was a Chu man, named Yuan. Yuan's father was named Wu She. Yuan's elder brother was named Wu Shang. His ancestor was named Wu Ju, who served King Zhuang of Chu with upright remonstration, gained prominence, therefore his descendants were famous in Chu.

sentences.zh: 楚平王有太子名曰建，使伍奢為太傅，費無忌為少傅。

translations.literal: King Ping of Chu had a crown prince named Jian, made Wu She grand tutor, Fei Wuji junior tutor.
translations.idiomatic: King Ping of Chu had a crown prince named Jian. He made Wu She grand tutor and Fei Wuji junior tutor.

sentences.zh: 無忌不忠於太子建。

translations.literal: Wuji was not loyal to Crown Prince Jian.
translations.idiomatic: Wuji was not loyal to Crown Prince Jian.

sentences.zh: 平王使無忌為太子取婦於秦，秦女好，無忌馳歸報平王曰：「秦女絕美，王可自取，而更為太子取婦。」

translations.literal: King Ping sent Wuji to take a wife for the crown prince from Qin, the Qin woman was beautiful, Wuji galloped back to report to King Ping saying: 'The Qin woman is exceptionally beautiful, the king can take her himself, and get another wife for the crown prince.'
translations.idiomatic: King Ping sent Wuji to take a wife for the crown prince from Qin. The Qin woman was beautiful, so Wuji galloped back to report to King Ping, saying: 'The Qin woman is exceptionally beautiful. The king can take her himself and get another wife for the crown prince.'

sentences.zh: 平王遂自取秦女而絕愛幸之，生子軫。

translations.literal: King Ping then took the Qin woman himself and doted on her exclusively, gave birth to son Zhen.
translations.idiomatic: King Ping then took the Qin woman himself and doted on her exclusively. She gave birth to a son named Zhen.

sentences.zh: 更為太子取婦。

translations.literal: Got another wife for the crown prince.
translations.idiomatic: He got another wife for the crown prince.

translations.literal: King Ping of Chu had a crown prince named Jian, made Wu She grand tutor, Fei Wuji junior tutor. Wuji was not loyal to Crown Prince Jian. King Ping sent Wuji to take a wife for the crown prince from Qin, the Qin woman was beautiful, Wuji galloped back to report to King Ping saying: 'The Qin woman is exceptionally beautiful, the king can take her himself, and get another wife for the crown prince.' King Ping then took the Qin woman himself and doted on her exclusively, gave birth to son Zhen. Got another wife for the crown prince.

sentences.zh: 無忌既以秦女自媚於平王，因去太子而事平王。

translations.literal: Wuji having used the Qin woman to curry favor with King Ping, then left the crown prince and served King Ping.
translations.idiomatic: Wuji, having used the Qin woman to curry favor with King Ping, then left the crown prince and served King Ping.

sentences.zh: 恐一旦平王卒而太子立，殺己，乃因讒太子建。

translations.literal: Feared that once King Ping died and the crown prince ascended, he would kill him, so slandered Crown Prince Jian.
translations.idiomatic: He feared that once King Ping died and the crown prince ascended, he would kill him, so he slandered Crown Prince Jian.

sentences.zh: 建母，蔡女也，無寵於平王。

translations.literal: Jian's mother was a Cai woman, had no favor with King Ping.
translations.idiomatic: Jian's mother was a woman from Cai, and she had no favor with King Ping.

sentences.zh: 平王稍益疏建，使建守城父，備邊兵。

translations.literal: King Ping gradually grew more distant from Jian, made Jian guard Chengfu, prepare border troops.
translations.idiomatic: King Ping gradually grew more distant from Jian. He made Jian guard Chengfu and prepare the border troops.

translations.literal: Wuji having used the Qin woman to curry favor with King Ping, then left the crown prince and served King Ping. Feared that once King Ping died and the crown prince ascended, he would kill him, so slandered Crown Prince Jian. Jian's mother was a Cai woman, had no favor with King Ping. King Ping gradually grew more distant from Jian, made Jian guard Chengfu, prepare border troops.

sentences.zh: 頃之，無忌又日夜言太子短於王曰：「太子以秦女之故，不能無怨望，願王少自備也。

translations.literal: After a while, Wuji again day and night spoke of the crown prince's faults to the king saying: 'Because of the Qin woman's matter, the crown prince cannot but harbor resentment, I wish the king would slightly prepare himself.
translations.idiomatic: After a while, Wuji again spoke day and night of the crown prince's faults to the king, saying: 'Because of the Qin woman's matter, the crown prince cannot but harbor resentment. I wish the king would prepare himself slightly.

sentences.zh: 自太子居城父，將兵，外交諸侯，且欲入為亂矣。」

translations.literal: Since the crown prince dwells in Chengfu, commands troops, externally associates with feudal lords, and moreover wishes to enter and make chaos.'
translations.idiomatic: Since the crown prince dwells in Chengfu, commands troops, externally associates with feudal lords, and moreover wishes to enter and make chaos.''

sentences.zh: 平王乃召其太傅伍奢考問之。

translations.literal: King Ping then summoned his grand tutor Wu She to interrogate him.
translations.idiomatic: King Ping then summoned his grand tutor Wu She to interrogate him.

sentences.zh: 伍奢知無忌讒太子於平王，因曰：「王獨柰何以讒賊小臣疏骨肉之親乎？」

translations.literal: Wu She knew Wuji was slandering the crown prince to King Ping, so said: 'Why does the king alone use slanderous traitorous petty officials to estrange flesh and blood kin?'
translations.idiomatic: Wu She knew Wuji was slandering the crown prince to King Ping, so he said: 'Why does the king alone use slanderous traitorous petty officials to estrange flesh and blood kin?'

sentences.zh: 無忌曰：「王今不制，其事成矣。

translations.literal: Wuji said: 'If the king does not control this now, the matter will succeed.
translations.idiomatic: Wuji said: 'If the king does not control this now, the matter will succeed.

sentences.zh: 王且見禽。」

translations.literal: The king will soon be captured.'
translations.idiomatic: The king will soon be captured.''

sentences.zh: 於是平王怒，囚伍奢，而使城父司馬奮揚往殺太子。

translations.literal: Then King Ping was angry, imprisoned Wu She, and sent Chengfu commander Fu Yang to go kill the crown prince.
translations.idiomatic: Then King Ping was angry, imprisoned Wu She, and sent the Chengfu commander Fu Yang to go kill the crown prince.

sentences.zh: 行未至，奮揚使人先告太子：「太子急去，不然將誅。」

translations.literal: Before arriving, Fu Yang sent someone to first warn the crown prince: 'Crown prince flee quickly, otherwise will be executed.'
translations.idiomatic: Before arriving, Fu Yang sent someone to first warn the crown prince: 'Crown prince, flee quickly, otherwise you will be executed.'

sentences.zh: 太子建亡奔宋。

translations.literal: Crown Prince Jian fled to Song.
translations.idiomatic: Crown Prince Jian fled to Song.

translations.literal: After a while, Wuji again day and night spoke of the crown prince's faults to the king saying: 'Because of the Qin woman's matter, the crown prince cannot but harbor resentment, I wish the king would slightly prepare himself. Since the crown prince dwells in Chengfu, commands troops, externally associates with feudal lords, and moreover wishes to enter and make chaos.' King Ping then summoned his grand tutor Wu She to interrogate him. Wu She knew Wuji was slandering the crown prince to King Ping, so said: 'Why does the king alone use slanderous traitorous petty officials to estrange flesh and blood kin?' Wuji said: 'If the king does not control this now, the matter will succeed. The king will soon be captured.' Then King Ping was angry, imprisoned Wu She, and sent Chengfu commander Fu Yang to go kill the crown prince. Before arriving, Fu Yang sent someone to first warn the crown prince: 'Crown prince flee quickly, otherwise will be executed.' Crown Prince Jian fled to Song.

sentences.zh: 無忌言於平王曰：「伍奢有二子，皆賢，不誅且為楚憂。

translations.literal: Wuji spoke to King Ping saying: 'Wu She has two sons, both worthy, if not executed will be a worry for Chu.
translations.idiomatic: Wuji spoke to King Ping, saying: 'Wu She has two sons, both worthy. If not executed, they will be a worry for Chu.

sentences.zh: 可以其父質而召之，不然且為楚患。」

translations.literal: Can use their father as hostage and summon them, otherwise will become a calamity for Chu.'
translations.idiomatic: Can use their father as hostage and summon them, otherwise they will become a calamity for Chu.''

sentences.zh: 王使使謂伍奢曰：「能致汝二子則生，不能則死。」

translations.literal: The king sent an envoy to tell Wu She: 'If you can bring your two sons then live, if cannot then die.'
translations.idiomatic: The king sent an envoy to tell Wu She: 'If you can bring your two sons, then live; if you cannot, then die.'

sentences.zh: 伍奢曰：「尚為人仁，呼必來。

translations.literal: Wu She said: 'Shang is humane in character, if called will certainly come.
translations.idiomatic: Wu She said: 'Shang is humane in character. If called, he will certainly come.

sentences.zh: 員為人剛戾忍訽，能成大事，彼見來之并禽，其勢必不來。」

translations.literal: Yuan is fierce and harsh in character, can endure humiliation, can accomplish great matters, he seeing that coming means both captured, the situation certainly will not come.'
translations.idiomatic: Yuan is fierce and harsh in character, can endure humiliation, and can accomplish great matters. He sees that coming means both will be captured, so the situation certainly means he will not come.''

sentences.zh: 王不聽，使人召二子曰：「來，吾生汝父；

translations.literal: The king did not listen, sent someone to summon the two sons saying: 'Come, I will let your father live;
translations.idiomatic: The king did not listen and sent someone to summon the two sons, saying: 'Come, I will let your father live;

sentences.zh: 不來，今殺奢也。」

translations.literal: If not come, now kill She.'
translations.idiomatic: if you do not come, I will kill She now.''

sentences.zh: 伍尚欲往，員曰：「楚之召我兄弟，非欲以生我父也，恐有脫者後生患，故以父為質，詐召二子。

translations.literal: Wu Shang wished to go, Yuan said: 'Chu's summoning of us brothers is not to let our father live, fears there are escapees who will later cause trouble, therefore uses father as hostage, deceives and summons the two sons.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Shang wished to go, but Yuan said: 'Chu's summoning of us brothers is not to let our father live. They fear that escapees will later cause trouble, so they use our father as hostage and deceitfully summon the two sons.

sentences.zh: 二子到，則父子俱死。

translations.literal: Two sons arrive, then father and sons all die.
translations.idiomatic: If the two sons arrive, then father and sons will all die.

sentences.zh: 何益父之死？

translations.literal: What benefit father's death?
translations.idiomatic: What benefit is there in father's death?

sentences.zh: 往而令讎不得報耳。

translations.literal: Going just lets the enemy not be avenged.
translations.idiomatic: Going would just mean that the enemy cannot be avenged.

sentences.zh: 不如奔他國，借力以雪父之恥，俱滅，無為也。」

translations.literal: Better to flee to another state, borrow strength to avenge father's humiliation, together extinguished, no benefit.'
translations.idiomatic: Better to flee to another state, borrow strength to avenge father's humiliation. Being extinguished together would be of no benefit.''

sentences.zh: 伍尚曰：「我知往終不能全父命。

translations.literal: Wu Shang said: 'I know going ultimately cannot save father's life.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Shang said: 'I know that going ultimately cannot save father's life.

sentences.zh: 然恨父召我以求生而不往，後不能雪恥，終為天下笑耳。」

translations.literal: But hate that father summoned me seeking life and not go, later cannot avenge humiliation, ultimately become world's laughingstock.'
translations.idiomatic: But I would hate that father summoned me seeking life and I did not go. Later I could not avenge the humiliation and would ultimately become the world's laughingstock.''

sentences.zh: 謂員：「可去矣！

translations.literal: Told Yuan: 'You can go!
translations.idiomatic: He told Yuan: 'You can go!

sentences.zh: 汝能報殺父之讎，我將歸死。」

translations.literal: If you can avenge killing father's enemy, I will return and die.'
translations.idiomatic: If you can avenge killing father's enemy, I will return and die.''

sentences.zh: 尚既就執，使者捕伍胥。

translations.literal: Shang having been captured, the envoy captured Wu Xi.
translations.idiomatic: Shang having been captured, the envoy then tried to capture Wu Xi.

sentences.zh: 伍胥貫弓執矢向使者，使者不敢進，伍胥遂亡。

translations.literal: Wu Xi strung his bow and held arrows pointing at the envoy, the envoy dared not advance, Wu Xi then fled.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Xi strung his bow and held arrows pointing at the envoy. The envoy dared not advance, so Wu Xi then fled.

sentences.zh: 聞太子建之在宋，往從之。

translations.literal: Heard Crown Prince Jian was in Song, went to follow him.
translations.idiomatic: He heard that Crown Prince Jian was in Song, so he went to follow him.

sentences.zh: 奢聞子胥之亡也，曰：「楚國君臣且苦兵矣。」

translations.literal: She heard of Wu Xi's flight, said: 'Chu's ruler and ministers will suffer from warfare.'
translations.idiomatic: She heard of Wu Xi's flight and said: 'Chu's ruler and ministers will suffer from warfare.''

sentences.zh: 伍尚至楚，楚并殺奢與尚也。

translations.literal: Wu Shang arrived in Chu, Chu executed both She and Shang.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Shang arrived in Chu, and Chu executed both She and Shang.

translations.literal: Wuji spoke to King Ping saying: 'Wu She has two sons, both worthy, if not executed will be a worry for Chu. Can use their father as hostage and summon them, otherwise will become a calamity for Chu.' The king sent an envoy to tell Wu She: 'If you can bring your two sons then live, if cannot then die.' Wu She said: 'Shang is humane in character, if called will certainly come. Yuan is fierce and harsh in character, can endure humiliation, can accomplish great matters, he seeing that coming means both captured, the situation certainly will not come.' The king did not listen, sent someone to summon the two sons saying: 'Come, I will let your father live; If not come, now kill She.' Wu Shang wished to go, Yuan said: 'Chu's summoning of us brothers is not to let our father live, fears there are escapees who will later cause trouble, therefore uses father as hostage, deceives and summons the two sons. Two sons arrive, then father and sons all die. What benefit father's death? Going just lets the enemy not be avenged. Better to flee to another state, borrow strength to avenge father's humiliation, together extinguished, no benefit.' Wu Shang said: 'I know going ultimately cannot save father's life. But hate that father summoned me seeking life and not go, later cannot avenge humiliation, ultimately become world's laughingstock.' Told Yuan: 'You can go! If you can avenge killing father's enemy, I will return and die.' Shang having been captured, the envoy captured Wu Xi. Wu Xi strung his bow and held arrows pointing at the envoy, the envoy dared not advance, Wu Xi then fled. Heard Crown Prince Jian was in Song, went to follow him. She heard of Wu Xi's flight, said: 'Chu's ruler and ministers will suffer from warfare.' Wu Shang arrived in Chu, Chu executed both She and Shang.

sentences.zh: 伍胥既至宋，宋有華氏之亂，乃與太子建俱奔於鄭。

translations.literal: Wu Xi having arrived in Song, Song had the Hua clan rebellion, so together with Crown Prince Jian fled to Zheng.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Xi having arrived in Song, there was the Hua clan rebellion in Song, so together with Crown Prince Jian they fled to Zheng.

sentences.zh: 鄭人甚善之。

translations.literal: The Zheng people treated them very well.
translations.idiomatic: The Zheng people treated them very well.

sentences.zh: 太子建又適晉，晉頃公曰：「太子既善鄭，鄭信太子。

translations.literal: Crown Prince Jian again went to Jin, Duke Qing of Jin said: 'The crown prince is on good terms with Zheng, Zheng trusts the crown prince.
translations.idiomatic: Crown Prince Jian again went to Jin. Duke Qing of Jin said: 'The crown prince is on good terms with Zheng, and Zheng trusts the crown prince.

sentences.zh: 太子能為我內應，而我攻其外，滅鄭必矣。

translations.literal: If the crown prince can be my internal supporter, and I attack from outside, extinguishing Zheng is certain.
translations.idiomatic: If the crown prince can be my internal supporter while I attack from outside, extinguishing Zheng is certain.

sentences.zh: 滅鄭而封太子。」

translations.literal: Extinguish Zheng and enfeoff the crown prince.'
translations.idiomatic: Extinguish Zheng and enfeoff the crown prince.''

sentences.zh: 太子乃還鄭。

translations.literal: The crown prince then returned to Zheng.
translations.idiomatic: The crown prince then returned to Zheng.

sentences.zh: 事未會，會自私欲殺其從者，從者知其謀，乃告之於鄭。

translations.literal: The matter had not come to pass, but Hui privately desired to kill his followers, the followers knew his plot, so reported it to Zheng.
translations.idiomatic: The matter had not come to pass, but Hui privately desired to kill his followers. The followers knew his plot, so they reported it to Zheng.

sentences.zh: 鄭定公與子產誅殺太子建。

translations.literal: Duke Ding of Zheng and Zi Chan executed Crown Prince Jian.
translations.idiomatic: Duke Ding of Zheng and Zi Chan executed Crown Prince Jian.

sentences.zh: 建有子名勝。

translations.literal: Jian had a son named Sheng.
translations.idiomatic: Jian had a son named Sheng.

sentences.zh: 伍胥懼，乃與勝俱奔吳。

translations.literal: Wu Xi feared, so together with Sheng fled to Wu.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Xi feared, so together with Sheng he fled to Wu.

sentences.zh: 到昭關，昭關欲執之。

translations.literal: Arrived at Zhao Pass, Zhao Pass wished to capture them.
translations.idiomatic: They arrived at Zhao Pass, where the guards wished to capture them.

sentences.zh: 伍胥遂與勝獨身步走，幾不得脫。

translations.literal: Wu Xi then with Sheng alone on foot fled, almost could not escape.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Xi then fled on foot with Sheng alone, almost unable to escape.

sentences.zh: 追者在後。

translations.literal: Pursuers behind.
translations.idiomatic: Pursuers were behind them.

sentences.zh: 至江，江上有一漁父乘船，知伍胥之急，乃渡伍胥。

translations.literal: Arrived at the Jiang, on the Jiang there was a fisherman in a boat, knew Wu Xi urgency, so ferried Wu Xi.
translations.idiomatic: They arrived at the Jiang. On the Jiang there was a fisherman in a boat who knew Wu Xi's urgency, so he ferried Wu Xi.

sentences.zh: 伍胥既渡，解其劍曰：「此劍直百金，以與父。」

translations.literal: Wu Xi having crossed, untied his sword saying: "This sword worth one hundred jin, give to father."
translations.idiomatic: Wu Xi, having crossed, untied his sword and said: 'This sword is worth one hundred jin. I give it to you, father.'

sentences.zh: 父曰：「楚國之法，得伍胥者賜粟五萬石，爵執珪，豈徒百金劍邪！」

translations.literal: Father said: "Chu law, one who gets Wu Xi granted five myriads shi grain, rank holding jade gui, how just one hundred jin sword!"
translations.idiomatic: The father said: 'According to Chu law, one who gets Wu Xi is granted five myriads shi of grain and the rank of holding jade gui. How is this just a one hundred jin sword!'

sentences.zh: 不受。

translations.literal: Did not accept.
translations.idiomatic: He did not accept.

sentences.zh: 伍胥未至吳而疾，止中道，乞食。

translations.literal: Wu Xi not yet arrived Wu fell ill, stopped midway, begged food.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Xi fell ill before reaching Wu, stopped midway, and begged for food.

sentences.zh: 至於吳，吳王僚方用事，公子光為將。

translations.literal: Arrived Wu, King Liao of Wu in power, Prince Guang general.
translations.idiomatic: He arrived in Wu, where King Liao of Wu was in power and Prince Guang was general.

sentences.zh: 伍胥乃因公子光以求見吳王。

translations.literal: Wu Xi then through Prince Guang sought audience King Wu.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Xi then sought an audience with the King of Wu through Prince Guang.

translations.literal: Wu Xi having arrived in Song, Song had the Hua clan rebellion, so together with Crown Prince Jian fled to Zheng. The Zheng people treated them very well. Crown Prince Jian again went to Jin, Duke Qing of Jin said: 'The crown prince is on good terms with Zheng, Zheng trusts the crown prince. If the crown prince can be my internal supporter, and I attack from outside, extinguishing Zheng is certain. Extinguish Zheng and enfeoff the crown prince.' The crown prince then returned to Zheng. The matter had not come to pass, but Hui privately desired to kill his followers, the followers knew his plot, so reported it to Zheng. Duke Ding of Zheng and Zi Chan executed Crown Prince Jian. Jian had a son named Sheng. Wu Xi feared, so together with Sheng fled to Wu. Arrived at Zhao Pass, Zhao Pass wished to capture them. Wu Xi then with Sheng alone on foot fled, almost could not escape. Pursuers behind. Arrived at the Jiang, on the Jiang there was a fisherman in a boat, knew Wu Xi urgency, so ferried Wu Xi. Wu Xi having crossed, untied his sword saying: "This sword worth one hundred jin, give to father." Father said: "Chu law, one who gets Wu Xi granted five myriads shi grain, rank holding jade gui, how just one hundred jin sword!" Did not accept. Wu Xi not yet arrived Wu fell ill, stopped midway, begged food. Arrived Wu, King Liao of Wu in power, Prince Guang general. Wu Xi then through Prince Guang sought audience King Wu.

sentences.zh: 久之，楚平王以其邊邑鐘離與吳邊邑卑梁氏俱蠶，兩女子爭桑相攻，乃大怒，至於兩國舉兵相伐。

translations.literal: After long time, King Ping Chu with his border town Zhongli and Wu border town Bei Liang clan both sericulture, two women quarreled mulberry attacked each other, greatly angered, extent both states raised troops invade each other.
translations.idiomatic: After a long time, King Ping of Chu's border town Zhongli and Wu's border town Bei Liang clan both engaged in sericulture. Two women quarreled over mulberry trees and attacked each other. This greatly angered them, leading to both states raising troops to invade each other.

sentences.zh: 吳使公子光伐楚，拔其鐘離、居巢而歸。

translations.literal: Wu sent Prince Guang attack Chu, captured their Zhongli, Ju Chao returned.
translations.idiomatic: Wu sent Prince Guang to attack Chu. He captured Zhongli and Ju Chao, then returned.

sentences.zh: 伍子胥說吳王僚曰：「楚可破也。

translations.literal: Wu Zixu advised King Liao Wu saying: "Chu can broken.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Zixu advised King Liao of Wu, saying: 'Chu can be broken.

sentences.zh: 願復遣公子光。」

translations.literal: Wish again send Prince Guang."
translations.idiomatic: I wish to send Prince Guang again.''

sentences.zh: 公子光謂吳王曰：「彼伍胥父兄為戮於楚，而勸王伐楚者，欲以自報其讎耳。

translations.literal: Prince Guang told King Wu: "That Wu Xi father elder brother slaughtered by Chu, advises king attack Chu, desires personally avenge his enmity.
translations.idiomatic: Prince Guang told the King of Wu: 'That Wu Xi's father and elder brother were slaughtered by Chu, so he advises the king to attack Chu because he desires to personally avenge his enmity.

sentences.zh: 伐楚未可破也。」

translations.literal: Attack Chu not yet can break."
translations.idiomatic: Attacking Chu cannot yet break it.''

sentences.zh: 伍胥知公子光有內志，欲殺王而自立，未可說以外事，乃進專諸於公子光，退而與太子建之子勝耕於野。

translations.literal: Wu Xi knew Prince Guang had inner ambitions, wished kill king establish himself, could not advise external matters, introduced Zhuan Zhu to Prince Guang, withdrew with Crown Prince Jian son Sheng farmed fields.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Xi knew Prince Guang had inner ambitions and wished to kill the king and establish himself. He could not advise him about external matters, so he introduced Zhuan Zhu to Prince Guang. He then withdrew and farmed in the fields with Crown Prince Jian's son Sheng.

translations.literal: After long time, King Ping Chu with his border town Zhongli and Wu border town Bei Liang clan both sericulture, two women quarreled mulberry attacked each other, greatly angered, extent both states raised troops invade each other. Wu sent Prince Guang attack Chu, captured their Zhongli, Ju Chao returned. Wu Zixu advised King Liao Wu saying: "Chu can broken. Wish again send Prince Guang." Prince Guang told King Wu: "That Wu Xi father elder brother slaughtered by Chu, advises king attack Chu, desires personally avenge his enmity. Attack Chu not yet can break." Wu Xi knew Prince Guang had inner ambitions, wished kill king establish himself, could not advise external matters, introduced Zhuan Zhu to Prince Guang, withdrew with Crown Prince Jian son Sheng farmed fields.

sentences.zh: 五年而楚平王卒。

translations.literal: Five years King Ping Chu died.
translations.idiomatic: Five years later, King Ping of Chu died.

sentences.zh: 初，平王所奪太子建秦女生子軫，及平王卒，軫竟立為後，是為昭王。

translations.literal: Initially, King Ping seized Crown Prince Jian Qin woman gave birth son Zhen, King Ping died, Zhen finally established heir, this King Zhao.
translations.idiomatic: Initially, the Qin woman whom King Ping had seized from Crown Prince Jian gave birth to a son named Zhen. When King Ping died, Zhen was finally established as heir. This was King Zhao.

sentences.zh: 吳王僚因楚喪，使二公子將兵往襲楚。

translations.literal: King Liao Wu took advantage Chu mourning, sent two princes lead troops invade Chu.
translations.idiomatic: King Liao of Wu took advantage of Chu's mourning and sent two princes to lead troops and invade Chu.

sentences.zh: 楚發兵絕吳兵之後，不得歸。

translations.literal: Chu sent troops cut Wu troops rear, could not return.
translations.idiomatic: Chu sent troops to cut off the rear of the Wu troops, so they could not return.

sentences.zh: 吳國內空，而公子光乃令專諸襲刺吳王僚而自立，是為吳王闔廬。

translations.literal: Wu state interior empty, Prince Guang ordered Zhuan Zhu assassinate King Liao Wu established himself, this King Helü Wu.
translations.idiomatic: Wu's interior was empty, so Prince Guang ordered Zhuan Zhu to assassinate King Liao of Wu and establish himself. This was King Helü of Wu.

sentences.zh: 闔廬既立，得志，乃召伍員以為行人，而與謀國事。

translations.literal: Helü established, achieved ambitions, summoned Wu Yuan envoy, with him planned state affairs.
translations.idiomatic: Helü, having been established and achieved his ambitions, summoned Wu Yuan to be his envoy and planned state affairs with him.

translations.literal: Five years King Ping Chu died. Initially, King Ping seized Crown Prince Jian Qin woman gave birth son Zhen, King Ping died, Zhen finally established heir, this King Zhao. King Liao Wu took advantage Chu mourning, sent two princes lead troops invade Chu. Chu sent troops cut Wu troops rear, could not return. Wu state interior empty, Prince Guang ordered Zhuan Zhu assassinate King Liao Wu established himself, this King Helü Wu. Helü established, achieved ambitions, summoned Wu Yuan envoy, with him planned state affairs.

sentences.zh: 楚誅其大臣郤宛、伯州犁，伯州犁之孫伯嚭亡奔吳，吳亦以嚭為大夫。

translations.literal: Chu executed its ministers Xi Wan, Bo Zhou Li, Bo Zhou Li grandson Bo Pi fled Wu, Wu also made Pi grand master.
translations.idiomatic: Chu executed its ministers Xi Wan and Bo Zhou Li. Bo Zhou Li's grandson Bo Pi fled to Wu, and Wu also made Pi a grand master.

sentences.zh: 前王僚所遣二公子將兵伐楚者，道絕不得歸。

translations.literal: Former King Liao sent two princes lead troops attack Chu, way cut could not return.
translations.idiomatic: The two princes whom the former King Liao had sent to lead troops and attack Chu had their way cut off and could not return.

sentences.zh: 後聞闔廬弒王僚自立，遂以其兵降楚，楚封之於舒。

translations.literal: Later heard Helü assassinated King Liao self-established, then their troops surrendered Chu, Chu enfeoffed them Shu.
translations.idiomatic: Later they heard that Helü had assassinated King Liao and established himself, so they surrendered their troops to Chu. Chu enfeoffed them at Shu.

sentences.zh: 闔廬立三年，乃興師與伍胥、伯嚭伐楚，拔舒，遂禽故吳反二將軍。

translations.literal: Helü established three years, raised troops with Wu Xi, Bo Pi attacked Chu, captured Shu, captured former Wu rebel two generals.
translations.idiomatic: Three years after Helü was established, he raised troops and with Wu Xi and Bo Pi attacked Chu. He captured Shu and captured the two former Wu generals who had rebelled.

sentences.zh: 因欲至郢，將軍孫武曰：「民勞，未可，且待之。」

translations.literal: Wished go Ying, General Sun Wu said: "People weary, not yet can, moreover wait."
translations.idiomatic: He then wished to go to Ying, but General Sun Wu said: 'The people are weary. It cannot be done yet. Moreover, wait.'

sentences.zh: 乃歸。

translations.literal: Then returned.
translations.idiomatic: They then returned.

translations.literal: Chu executed its ministers Xi Wan, Bo Zhou Li, Bo Zhou Li grandson Bo Pi fled Wu, Wu also made Pi grand master. Former King Liao sent two princes lead troops attack Chu, way cut could not return. Later heard Helü assassinated King Liao self-established, then their troops surrendered Chu, Chu enfeoffed them Shu. Helü established three years, raised troops with Wu Xi, Bo Pi attacked Chu, captured Shu, captured former Wu rebel two generals. Wished go Ying, General Sun Wu said: "People weary, not yet can, moreover wait." Then returned.

sentences.zh: 四年，吳伐楚，取六與灊。

translations.literal: Fourth year, Wu attacked Chu, took Liu and Qian.
translations.idiomatic: In the fourth year, Wu attacked Chu and took Liu and Qian.

sentences.zh: 五年，伐越，敗之。

translations.literal: Fifth year, attacked Yue, defeated them.
translations.idiomatic: In the fifth year, they attacked Yue and defeated them.

sentences.zh: 六年，楚昭王使公子囊瓦將兵伐吳。

translations.literal: Sixth year, King Zhao Chu sent Prince Nang Wa lead troops attack Wu.
translations.idiomatic: In the sixth year, King Zhao of Chu sent Prince Nang Wa to lead troops and attack Wu.

sentences.zh: 吳使伍員迎擊，大破楚軍於豫章，取楚之居巢。

translations.literal: Wu sent Wu Xi meet attack, greatly defeated Chu army Yu Zhang, took Chu Ju Chao.
translations.idiomatic: Wu sent Wu Xi to meet and attack them. He greatly defeated the Chu army at Yu Zhang and took Chu's Ju Chao.

translations.literal: Fourth year, Wu attacked Chu, took Liu and Qian. Fifth year, attacked Yue, defeated them. Sixth year, King Zhao Chu sent Prince Nang Wa lead troops attack Wu. Wu sent Wu Xi meet attack, greatly defeated Chu army Yu Zhang, took Chu Ju Chao.

sentences.zh: 九年，吳王闔廬謂子胥、孫武曰：「始子言郢未可入，今果何如？」

translations.literal: Ninth year, King Helü Wu told Wu Xi, Sun Wu: "Initially you said Ying not enter, now indeed how?"
translations.idiomatic: In the ninth year, King Helü of Wu told Wu Xi and Sun Wu: 'Initially you said Ying could not be entered. Now indeed, how is it?'

sentences.zh: 二子對曰：「楚將囊瓦貪，而唐、蔡皆怨之。

translations.literal: Two replied: "Chu general Nang Wa greedy, Tang, Cai all resent him.
translations.idiomatic: The two replied: 'The Chu general Nang Wa is greedy, and Tang and Cai all resent him.

sentences.zh: 王必欲大伐之，必先得唐、蔡乃可。」

translations.literal: King must greatly attack, must first get Tang, Cai then can."
translations.idiomatic: If the king must greatly attack them, he must first get Tang and Cai, then it can be done.''

sentences.zh: 闔廬聽之，悉興師與唐、蔡伐楚，與楚夾漢水而陳。

translations.literal: Helü listened, completely raised troops with Tang, Cai attacked Chu, with Chu lined across Han water.
translations.idiomatic: Helü listened to them. He completely raised troops and with Tang and Cai attacked Chu. They lined up across the Han River with Chu.

sentences.zh: 吳王之弟夫概將兵請從，王不聽，遂以其屬五千人擊楚將子常。

translations.literal: Wu king younger brother Fu Gai led troops requested follow, king not listened, then his followers five thousand attacked Chu general Zi Chang.
translations.idiomatic: The Wu king's younger brother Fu Gai led troops and requested to follow. The king did not listen, so he then attacked the Chu general Zi Chang with his followers of five thousand.

sentences.zh: 己卯，楚昭王出奔。

translations.literal: Ji Mao, King Zhao Chu fled.
translations.idiomatic: On Ji Mao day, King Zhao of Chu fled.

sentences.zh: 庚辰，吳王入郢。

translations.literal: Geng Chen, King Wu entered Ying.
translations.idiomatic: On Geng Chen day, the Wu king entered Ying.

sentences.zh: 子常敗走，奔鄭。

translations.literal: Zi Chang defeated fled, went Zheng.
translations.idiomatic: Zi Chang was defeated and fled to Zheng.

sentences.zh: 於是吳乘勝而前，五戰，遂至郢。

translations.literal: Then Wu took advantage victory advanced, five battles, arrived Ying.
translations.idiomatic: Then Wu took advantage of their victory and advanced. After five battles, they arrived at Ying.

translations.literal: Ninth year, King Helü Wu told Wu Xi, Sun Wu: "Initially you said Ying not enter, now indeed how?" Two replied: "Chu general Nang Wa greedy, Tang, Cai all resent him. King must greatly attack, must first get Tang, Cai then can." Helü listened, completely raised troops with Tang, Cai attacked Chu, with Chu lined across Han water. Wu king younger brother Fu Gai led troops requested follow, king not listened, then his followers five thousand attacked Chu general Zi Chang. Ji Mao, King Zhao Chu fled. Geng Chen, King Wu entered Ying. Zi Chang defeated fled, went Zheng. Then Wu took advantage victory advanced, five battles, arrived Ying.

sentences.zh: 昭王出亡，入雲夢；

translations.literal: King Zhao fled, entered Yun Meng;
translations.idiomatic: King Zhao fled and entered Yun Meng;

sentences.zh: 盜擊王，王走鄖。

translations.literal: Bandits attacked king, king fled Yun.
translations.idiomatic: bandits attacked the king, so the king fled to Yun.

sentences.zh: 鄖公弟懷曰：「平王殺我父，我殺其子，不亦可乎！」

translations.literal: Yun duke younger brother Huai said: "King Ping killed my father, I kill his son, not also can!"
translations.idiomatic: The Duke of Yun's younger brother Huai said: 'King Ping killed my father. If I kill his son, would that not also be acceptable!'

sentences.zh: 鄖公恐其弟殺王，與王奔隨。

translations.literal: Yun duke feared his younger brother kill king, with king fled Sui.
translations.idiomatic: The Duke of Yun feared his younger brother would kill the king, so he fled to Sui with the king.

sentences.zh: 吳兵圍隨，謂隨人曰：「周之子孫在漢川者，楚盡滅之。」

translations.literal: Wu troops surrounded Sui, told Sui people: "Zhou descendants in Han region, Chu completely extinguished them."
translations.idiomatic: Wu troops surrounded Sui and told the Sui people: 'Zhou descendants in the Han region—Chu has completely extinguished them.'

sentences.zh: 隨人欲殺王，王子綦匿王，己自為王以當之。

translations.literal: Sui people wished to kill king, Prince Qi hid king, himself became king to block it.
translations.idiomatic: The Sui people wished to kill the king. Prince Qi hid the king and himself became king to take his place.

sentences.zh: 隨人卜與王於吳，不吉，乃謝吳不與王。

translations.literal: Sui people divined give king to Wu, not auspicious, then declined Wu not give king.
translations.idiomatic: The Sui people divined giving the king to Wu. It was not auspicious, so they declined Wu and did not give the king.

translations.literal: King Zhao fled, entered Yun Meng; Bandits attacked king, king fled Yun. Yun duke younger brother Huai said: "King Ping killed my father, I kill his son, not also can!" Yun duke feared his younger brother kill king, with king fled Sui. Wu troops surrounded Sui, told Sui people: "Zhou descendants in Han region, Chu completely extinguished them." Sui people wished to kill king, Prince Qi hid king, himself became king to block it. Sui people divined give king to Wu, not auspicious, then declined Wu not give king.

sentences.zh: 始伍員與申包胥為交，員之亡也，謂包胥曰：「我必覆楚。」

translations.literal: Initially Wu Xi with Shen Bao Xu were friends, Xi fled, told Bao Xu: "I must overturn Chu."
translations.idiomatic: Initially Wu Xi and Shen Bao Xu were friends. When Xi fled, he told Bao Xu: 'I must overturn Chu.'

sentences.zh: 包胥曰：「我必存之。」

translations.literal: Bao Xu said: "I must preserve it."
translations.idiomatic: Bao Xu said: 'I must preserve it.'

sentences.zh: 及吳兵入郢，伍子胥求昭王。

translations.literal: When Wu troops entered Ying, Wu Zixu sought King Zhao.
translations.idiomatic: When Wu troops entered Ying, Wu Zixu sought King Zhao.

sentences.zh: 既不得，乃掘楚平王墓，出其尸，鞭之三百，然後已。

translations.literal: Having not obtained, then dug King Ping of Chu tomb, removed his corpse, whipped it three hundred times, then stopped.
translations.idiomatic: Having not obtained him, Wu Zixu then dug up King Ping of Chu's tomb, removed his corpse, whipped it three hundred times, and then stopped.

sentences.zh: 申包胥亡於山中，使人謂子胥曰：「子之報讎，其以甚乎！

translations.literal: Shen Bao Xu fled mountain midst, sent person tell Wu Xi: "Your avenging enmity, is it excessive!
translations.idiomatic: Shen Bao Xu fled into the mountains and sent someone to tell Wu Xi: 'Your avenging of enmity—is it excessive!'

sentences.zh: 吾聞之，人眾者勝天，天定亦能破人。

translations.literal: I heard, many people win heaven, heaven determined also can break people.
translations.idiomatic: 'I heard that where there are many people, they win against heaven. Heaven's determination can also be broken by people.

sentences.zh: 今子故平王之臣，親北面而事之，今至於僇死人，此豈其無天道之極乎！」

translations.literal: Now you formerly King Ping minister, personally north faced served him, now to mutilating dead person, this how no heaven way extreme!"
translations.idiomatic: Now you were formerly King Ping's minister and personally served him facing north. Now you have come to mutilating a dead person. How can this not be the extreme of heaven's way!''

sentences.zh: 伍子胥曰：「為我謝申包胥曰，吾日莫途遠，吾故倒行而逆施之。」

translations.literal: Wu Xi said: "For me thank Shen Bao Xu, my day evening path far, I therefore inverted walk reverse apply it."
translations.idiomatic: Wu Xi said: 'For me, thank Shen Bao Xu and say: "My day's evening path is far. I therefore walk inverted and apply things in reverse."'

sentences.zh: 於是申包胥走秦告急，求救於秦。

translations.literal: Then Shen Bao Xu went Qin report urgent, sought aid from Qin.
translations.idiomatic: Then Shen Bao Xu went to Qin to report the urgent situation and sought aid from Qin.

sentences.zh: 秦不許。

translations.literal: Qin not permitted.
translations.idiomatic: Qin did not permit it.

sentences.zh: 包胥立於秦廷，晝夜哭，七日七夜不絕其聲。

translations.literal: Bao Xu stood Qin court, day night cried, seven days seven nights not ceased sound.
translations.idiomatic: Bao Xu stood in the Qin court, crying day and night. For seven days and seven nights he did not cease his voice.

sentences.zh: 秦哀公憐之，曰：「楚雖無道，有臣若是，可無存乎！」

translations.literal: Qin Ai Gong pitied him, said: "Chu though no way, has minister like this, can no preserve?"
translations.idiomatic: Duke Ai of Qin pitied him and said: 'Though Chu has no way, it has a minister like this. Can it not be preserved!'

sentences.zh: 乃遣車五百乘救楚擊吳。

translations.literal: Then sent five hundred chariots save Chu attack Wu.
translations.idiomatic: He then sent five hundred chariots to save Chu and attack Wu.

sentences.zh: 六月，敗吳兵於稷。

translations.literal: Sixth month, defeated Wu troops at Ji.
translations.idiomatic: In the sixth month, they defeated the Wu troops at Ji.

sentences.zh: 會吳王久留楚求昭王，而闔廬弟夫概乃亡歸，自立為王。

translations.literal: Met Wu king long stayed Chu sought King Zhao, Helü younger brother Fu Gai fled returned, self-established as king.
translations.idiomatic: It happened that the Wu king stayed long in Chu seeking King Zhao, while Helü's younger brother Fu Gai fled back and established himself as king.

sentences.zh: 闔廬聞之，乃釋楚而歸，擊其弟夫概。

translations.literal: Helü heard it, then released Chu returned, attacked his younger brother Fu Gai.
translations.idiomatic: Helü heard it, then released Chu and returned, attacking his younger brother Fu Gai.

sentences.zh: 夫概敗走，遂奔楚。

translations.literal: Fu Gai defeated fled, then went Chu.
translations.idiomatic: Fu Gai was defeated and fled, then went to Chu.

sentences.zh: 楚昭王見吳有內亂，乃復入郢。

translations.literal: King Zhao of Chu saw Wu had internal chaos, then again entered Ying.
translations.idiomatic: King Zhao of Chu saw that Wu had internal chaos, so he again entered Ying.

sentences.zh: 封夫概於堂谿，為堂谿氏。

translations.literal: Enfeoffed Fu Gai at Tang Xi, became Tang Xi clan.
translations.idiomatic: He enfeoffed Fu Gai at Tang Xi, making him the Tang Xi clan.

sentences.zh: 楚復與吳戰，敗吳，吳王乃歸。

translations.literal: Chu again battled Wu, defeated Wu, Wu king then returned.
translations.idiomatic: Chu again battled Wu, defeated Wu, and the Wu king then returned.

translations.literal: Initially Wu Xi with Shen Bao Xu were friends, Xi fled, told Bao Xu: "I must overturn Chu." Bao Xu said: "I must preserve it." When Wu troops entered Ying, Wu Zixu sought King Zhao. Having not obtained, then dug King Ping of Chu tomb, removed his corpse, whipped it three hundred times, then stopped. Shen Bao Xu fled mountain midst, sent person tell Wu Xi: "Your avenging enmity, is it excessive! I heard, many people win heaven, heaven determined also can break people. Now you formerly King Ping minister, personally north faced served him, now to mutilating dead person, this how no heaven way extreme!" Wu Xi said: "For me thank Shen Bao Xu, my day evening path far, I therefore inverted walk reverse apply it." Then Shen Bao Xu went Qin report urgent, sought aid from Qin. Qin not permitted. Bao Xu stood Qin court, day night cried, seven days seven nights not ceased sound. Qin Ai Gong pitied him, said: "Chu though no way, has minister like this, can no preserve?" Then sent five hundred chariots save Chu attack Wu. Sixth month, defeated Wu troops at Ji. Met Wu king long stayed Chu sought King Zhao, Helü younger brother Fu Gai fled returned, self-established as king. Helü heard it, then released Chu returned, attacked his younger brother Fu Gai. Fu Gai defeated fled, then went Chu. King Zhao of Chu saw Wu had internal chaos, then again entered Ying. Enfeoffed Fu Gai at Tang Xi, became Tang Xi clan. Chu again battled Wu, defeated Wu, Wu king then returned.

sentences.zh: 後二歲，闔廬使太子夫差將兵伐楚，取番。

translations.literal: After two years, Helü made crown prince Fu Chai lead troops attack Chu, took Fan.
translations.idiomatic: After two years, Helü made Crown Prince Fu Chai lead troops to attack Chu and took Fan.

sentences.zh: 楚懼吳復大來，乃去郢，徙於鄀。

translations.literal: Chu feared Wu again greatly come, then left Ying, moved to Jiao.
translations.idiomatic: Chu feared Wu would come greatly again, so they left Ying and moved to Jiao.

sentences.zh: 當是時，吳以伍子胥、孫武之謀，西破彊楚，北威齊晉，南服越人。

translations.literal: At this time, Wu with Wu Xi, Sun Wu strategy, west broke strong Chu, north awed Qi Jin, south subjugated Yue people.
translations.idiomatic: At this time, Wu, using the strategies of Wu Xi and Sun Wu, west broke strong Chu, north awed Qi and Jin, and south subjugated the Yue people.

translations.literal: After two years, Helü made crown prince Fu Chai lead troops attack Chu, took Fan. Chu feared Wu again greatly come, then left Ying, moved to Jiao. At this time, Wu with Wu Xi, Sun Wu strategy, west broke strong Chu, north awed Qi Jin, south subjugated Yue people.

sentences.zh: 其後四年，孔子相魯。

translations.literal: Its after four years, Confucius chancellor Lu.
translations.idiomatic: Four years later, Confucius became chancellor of Lu.

translations.literal: Its after four years, Confucius chancellor Lu.

sentences.zh: 後五年，伐越。

translations.literal: After five years, attacked Yue.
translations.idiomatic: After five years, they attacked Yue.

sentences.zh: 越王句踐迎擊，敗吳於姑蘇，傷闔廬指，軍卻。

translations.literal: King Gou Jian of Yue welcomed attacked, defeated Wu at Gu Su, wounded Helü finger, army retreated.
translations.idiomatic: King Goujian of Yue welcomed and attacked them, defeated Wu at Gusu, wounded Helü's finger, and the army retreated.

sentences.zh: 闔廬病創將死，謂太子夫差曰：「爾忘句踐殺爾父乎？」

translations.literal: Helü ill from wound about to die, told crown prince Fu Chai: "You forget Gou Jian killed your father?"
translations.idiomatic: Helü, ill from his wound and about to die, told Crown Prince Fu Chai: 'Do you forget that Goujian killed your father?'

sentences.zh: 夫差對曰：「不敢忘。」

translations.literal: Fu Chai replied: "Dare not forget."
translations.idiomatic: Fu Chai replied: 'I dare not forget.'

sentences.zh: 是夕，闔廬死。

translations.literal: This night, Helü died.
translations.idiomatic: That night, Helü died.

sentences.zh: 夫差既立為王，以伯嚭為太宰，習戰射。

translations.literal: Fu Chai established as king, made Bo Pi grand steward, practiced battle archery.
translations.idiomatic: Fu Chai, having been established as king, made Bo Pi grand steward and practiced battle archery.

sentences.zh: 二年後伐越，敗越於夫湫。

translations.literal: After two years attacked Yue, defeated Yue at Fu Qiu.
translations.idiomatic: After two years, he attacked Yue and defeated Yue at Fu Qiu.

sentences.zh: 越王句踐乃以餘兵五千人棲於會稽之上，使大夫種厚幣遺吳太宰嚭以請和，求委國為臣妾。

translations.literal: King Gou Jian of Yue then with remaining troops five thousand dwelt atop Kui Ji, made grand master Zhong thick bribes send Wu grand steward Pi to request peace, sought to entrust state as minister concubine.
translations.idiomatic: King Goujian of Yue then, with his remaining five thousand troops, dwelt atop Kuaiji. He made Grand Master Zhong send thick bribes to Wu's grand steward Pi to request peace and sought to entrust his state as minister and concubine.

sentences.zh: 吳王將許之。

translations.literal: Wu king about to permit it.
translations.idiomatic: The Wu king was about to permit it.

sentences.zh: 伍子胥諫曰：「越王為人能辛苦。

translations.literal: Wu Xi remonstrated: "King Gou Jian character able hardship.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Zixu remonstrated: 'King Goujian in his character is able to endure hardship.

sentences.zh: 今王不滅，後必悔之。」

translations.literal: Now king not extinguish, later must regret."
translations.idiomatic: If the king does not extinguish them now, later he must regret it.''

sentences.zh: 吳王不聽，用太宰嚭計，與越平。

translations.literal: Wu king not listened, used grand steward Pi plan, made peace with Yue.
translations.idiomatic: The Wu king did not listen and used Grand Steward Pi's plan to make peace with Yue.

translations.literal: After five years, attacked Yue. King Gou Jian of Yue welcomed attacked, defeated Wu at Gu Su, wounded Helü finger, army retreated. Helü ill from wound about to die, told crown prince Fu Chai: "You forget Gou Jian killed your father?" Fu Chai replied: "Dare not forget." This night, Helü died. Fu Chai established as king, made Bo Pi grand steward, practiced battle archery. After two years attacked Yue, defeated Yue at Fu Qiu. King Gou Jian of Yue then with remaining troops five thousand dwelt atop Kui Ji, made grand master Zhong thick bribes send Wu grand steward Pi to request peace, sought to entrust state as minister concubine. Wu king about to permit it. Wu Xi remonstrated: "King Gou Jian character able hardship. Now king not extinguish, later must regret." Wu king not listened, used grand steward Pi plan, made peace with Yue.

sentences.zh: 其後五年，而吳王聞齊景公死而大臣爭寵，新君弱，乃興師北伐齊。

translations.literal: Its after five years, Wu king heard Qi Jing Gong died ministers contended favor, new jun weak, raised troops north attacked Qi.
translations.idiomatic: Five years later, the Wu king heard that Duke Jing of Qi had died and ministers were contending for favor, with the new ruler weak. He raised troops and attacked Qi to the north.

sentences.zh: 伍子胥諫曰：「句踐食不重味，弔死問疾，且欲有所用之也。

translations.literal: Wu Xi remonstrated: "Gou Jian eats not double flavors, mourns dead asks ill, moreover wishes use them.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Zixu remonstrated: 'Goujian eats no double flavors, mourns the dead and asks about the ill. Moreover, he wishes to use this.

sentences.zh: 此人不死，必為吳患。

translations.literal: This person not die, must become Wu calamity.
translations.idiomatic: If this person does not die, he must become a calamity for Wu.

sentences.zh: 今吳之有越，猶人之有腹心疾也。

translations.literal: Now Wu having Yue, like person having abdominal heart disease.
translations.idiomatic: Now Wu having Yue is like a person having an abdominal heart disease.

sentences.zh: 而王不先越而乃務齊，不亦謬乎！」

translations.literal: King not first Yue but strives Qi, not also mistaken?"
translations.idiomatic: The king does not put Yue first but strives for Qi—is this not also mistaken!''

sentences.zh: 吳王不聽，伐齊，大敗齊師於艾陵，遂威鄒魯之君以歸。

translations.literal: Wu king not listened, attacked Qi, greatly defeated Qi troops at Ai Ling, then awed Zou Lu jun returned.
translations.idiomatic: The Wu king did not listen and attacked Qi. He greatly defeated the Qi troops at Ailing, then awed the rulers of Zou and Lu and returned.

sentences.zh: 益疏子胥之謀。

translations.literal: Increasingly estranged Wu Xi strategy.
translations.idiomatic: He increasingly estranged Wu Zixu's strategies.

translations.literal: Its after five years, Wu king heard Qi Jing Gong died ministers contended favor, new jun weak, raised troops north attacked Qi. Wu Xi remonstrated: "Gou Jian eats not double flavors, mourns dead asks ill, moreover wishes use them. This person not die, must become Wu calamity. Now Wu having Yue, like person having abdominal heart disease. King not first Yue but strives Qi, not also mistaken?" Wu king not listened, attacked Qi, greatly defeated Qi troops at Ai Ling, then awed Zou Lu jun returned. Increasingly estranged Wu Xi strategy.

sentences.zh: 其後四年，吳王將北伐齊，越王句踐用子貢之謀，乃率其眾以助吳，而重寶以獻遺太宰嚭。

translations.literal: Its after four years, Wu king will north attack Qi, King Gou Jian of Yue used Zi Gong strategy, led his multitudes help Wu, heavy treasures offered grand steward Pi.
translations.idiomatic: Four years later, when the Wu king was about to attack Qi to the north, King Goujian of Yue used Zi Gong's strategy. He led his multitudes to help Wu and offered heavy treasures to Grand Steward Pi.

sentences.zh: 太宰嚭既數受越賂，其愛信越殊甚，日夜為言於吳王。

translations.literal: Grand steward Pi already several received Yue bribes, loved trusted Yue extremely, day night spoke at Wu king.
translations.idiomatic: Grand Steward Pi, having several times received Yue's bribes, loved and trusted Yue extremely. Day and night he spoke on their behalf to the Wu king.

sentences.zh: 吳王信用嚭之計。

translations.literal: Wu king trusted used Pi plan.
translations.idiomatic: The Wu king trusted and used Pi's plans.

sentences.zh: 伍子胥諫曰：「夫越，腹心之病，今信其浮辭詐偽而貪齊。

translations.literal: Wu Xi remonstrated: "Yue, abdominal heart disease, now believe their empty words deception greedy Qi.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Zixu remonstrated: 'Yue is an abdominal heart disease. Now the king believes their empty words and deception while being greedy for Qi.

sentences.zh: 破齊，譬猶石田，無所用之。

translations.literal: Break Qi, like stone field, nothing use."
translations.idiomatic: Breaking Qi is like a stone field—nothing can be used from it.''

sentences.zh: 且盤庚之誥曰：『有顛越不恭，劓殄滅之，俾無遺育，無使易種于茲邑。』

translations.literal: Moreover Pan Geng admonition said: "Have overturning not respectful, cut off extinguish them, make no remaining descendants, no make change seed at this yi."
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, Pan Geng's admonition said: 'Those who have overturning disrespect, cut them off and extinguish them. Make no remaining descendants, do not allow changing the seed in this city.''

sentences.zh: 此商之所以興。

translations.literal: This Shang so rose.
translations.idiomatic: This is why Shang rose.

sentences.zh: 願王釋齊而先越；

translations.literal: Wish king release Qi first Yue;
translations.idiomatic: I wish the king to release Qi and put Yue first;

sentences.zh: 若不然，後將悔之無及。」

translations.literal: If not so, later will regret without reach."
translations.idiomatic: if not, later you will regret it without being able to reach it.''

sentences.zh: 而吳王不聽，使子胥於齊。

translations.literal: Wu king not listened, sent Wu Xi to Qi.
translations.idiomatic: The Wu king did not listen and sent Wu Xi to Qi.

sentences.zh: 子胥臨行，謂其子曰：「吾數諫王，王不用，吾今見吳之亡矣。

translations.literal: Wu Xi about to depart, told his son: "I several remonstrated king, king not used, I now see Wu perish.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Xi, about to depart, told his son: 'I have several times remonstrated with the king, but the king did not use my advice. I now see Wu's perishing.

sentences.zh: 汝與吳俱亡，無益也。」

translations.literal: You with Wu together perish, no benefit."
translations.idiomatic: You perishing together with Wu would be of no benefit.''

sentences.zh: 乃屬其子於齊鮑牧，而還報吳。

translations.literal: Then entrusted his son to Qi Bao Mu, returned reported Wu.
translations.idiomatic: He then entrusted his son to Bao Mu of Qi and returned to report to Wu.

translations.literal: Its after four years, Wu king will north attack Qi, King Gou Jian of Yue used Zi Gong strategy, led his multitudes help Wu, heavy treasures offered grand steward Pi. Grand steward Pi already several received Yue bribes, loved trusted Yue extremely, day night spoke at Wu king. Wu king trusted used Pi plan. Wu Xi remonstrated: "Yue, abdominal heart disease, now believe their empty words deception greedy Qi. Break Qi, like stone field, nothing use." Moreover Pan Geng admonition said: "Have overturning not respectful, cut off extinguish them, make no remaining descendants, no make change seed at this yi." This Shang so rose. Wish king release Qi first Yue; If not so, later will regret without reach." Wu king not listened, sent Wu Xi to Qi. Wu Xi about to depart, told his son: "I several remonstrated king, king not used, I now see Wu perish. You with Wu together perish, no benefit." Then entrusted his son to Qi Bao Mu, returned reported Wu.

sentences.zh: 吳太宰嚭既與子胥有隙，因讒曰：「子胥為人剛暴，少恩，猜賊，其怨望恐為深禍也。

translations.literal: Wu grand steward Pi already with Wu Xi had enmity, because slandered: "Wu Xi character firm violent, little kindness, suspicious treacherous, his resentment fear become deep calamity.
translations.idiomatic: Wu's Grand Steward Pi, already having enmity with Wu Xi, therefore slandered: 'Wu Xi in character is firm and violent, with little kindness, suspicious and treacherous. His resentment fears becoming a deep calamity.

sentences.zh: 前日王欲伐齊，子胥以為不可，王卒伐之而有大功。

translations.literal: Former day king wished attack Qi, Wu Xi considered not can, king finally attacked had great merit.
translations.idiomatic: Previously the king wished to attack Qi. Wu Xi considered it not possible, but the king finally attacked and had great merit.

sentences.zh: 子胥恥其計謀不用，乃反怨望。

translations.literal: Wu Xi ashamed his plan strategy not used, then reversed resented.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Xi, ashamed that his plans and strategies were not used, then reversed and resented.

sentences.zh: 而今王又復伐齊，子胥專愎彊諫，沮毀用事，徒幸吳之敗以自勝其計謀耳。

translations.literal: Now king again attack Qi, Wu Xi obstinate strong remonstrated, obstructed destroyed affairs, vainly hoped Wu defeat to self win his plan.
translations.idiomatic: Now the king is attacking Qi again. Wu Xi obstinately and strongly remonstrates, obstructs and destroys affairs, vainly hoping for Wu's defeat to prove his own plans right.

sentences.zh: 今王自行，悉國中武力以伐齊，而子胥諫不用，因輟謝，詳病不行。

translations.literal: Now king personally go, all state midst martial strength attack Qi, Wu Xi remonstrated not used, because stopped declined, pretended ill not go.
translations.idiomatic: Now the king personally goes, using all the state's martial strength to attack Qi. Wu Xi's remonstrations not being used, he stopped and declined, pretending illness and not going.

sentences.zh: 王不可不備，此起禍不難。

translations.literal: King cannot not prepare, this raise calamity not difficult.
translations.idiomatic: The king cannot but prepare. This raising calamity is not difficult.

sentences.zh: 且嚭使人微伺之，其使於齊也，乃屬其子於齊之鮑氏。

translations.literal: Moreover Pi made person secretly spy him, his envoy to Qi, entrusted his son to Qi Bao clan.
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, Pi made people secretly spy on him. When he was envoy to Qi, he entrusted his son to the Bao clan of Qi.

sentences.zh: 夫為人臣，內不得意，外倚諸侯，自以為先王之謀臣，今不見用，常鞅鞅怨望。

translations.literal: Being person minister, inner not content, outer relied feudal lords, self considered former king strategist, now not seen used, often vexed resented.
translations.idiomatic: Being a minister, inwardly discontent, outwardly relying on feudal lords, self-considering a strategist for the former king, now not being used, often vexed and resentful.

sentences.zh: 願王早圖之。」

translations.literal: Wish king early plan it."
translations.idiomatic: I wish the king to plan for it early.''

sentences.zh: 吳王曰：「微子之言，吾亦疑之。」

translations.literal: Wu king said: "Without your words, I also doubted it."
translations.idiomatic: The Wu king said: 'Without your words, I also doubted it.'

sentences.zh: 乃使使賜伍子胥屬鏤之劍，曰：「子以此死。」

translations.literal: Then sent envoy grant Wu Xi linked sword, said: "You with this die."
translations.idiomatic: He then sent an envoy to grant Wu Xi a linked sword, saying: 'You die with this.'

sentences.zh: 伍子胥仰天嘆曰：「嗟乎！

translations.literal: Wu Xi gazed heaven sighed: "Alas!
translations.idiomatic: Wu Xi gazed at heaven and sighed: 'Alas!

sentences.zh: 讒臣嚭為亂矣，王乃反誅我。

translations.literal: Slander minister Pi made chaos, king instead executed me.
translations.idiomatic: The slanderous minister Pi has made chaos. The king instead executes me.

sentences.zh: 我令若父霸。

translations.literal: I made your father hegemon.
translations.idiomatic: I made your father a hegemon.

sentences.zh: 自若未立時，諸公子爭立，我以死爭之於先王，幾不得立。

translations.literal: From you not yet established, various princes contended establish, I with death contended for former king, almost not established.
translations.idiomatic: From when you were not yet established, the various princes contended for establishment. I contended for it unto death with the former king. He almost was not established.

sentences.zh: 若既得立，欲分吳國予我，我顧不敢望也。

translations.literal: You having obtained establish, wished divide Wu state give me, I still dared not hope.
translations.idiomatic: You, having obtained establishment, wished to divide the Wu state and give me some. I still dared not hope for it.

sentences.zh: 然今若聽諛臣言以殺長者。」

translations.literal: However now you listen flatter minister words to kill elder."
translations.idiomatic: However, now you listen to the flattering minister's words to kill an elder.''

sentences.zh: 乃告其舍人曰：「必樹吾墓上以梓，令可以為器；

translations.literal: Then told his attendant: "Certainly plant my grave above with catalpa, make can become vessel;
translations.idiomatic: He then told his attendant: 'Certainly plant catalpa trees above my grave, so they can become vessels;

sentences.zh: 而抉吾眼縣吳東門之上，以觀越寇之入滅吳也。」

translations.literal: Dig out my eyes hang Wu east gate above, to observe Yue bandits enter extinguish Wu."
translations.idiomatic: dig out my eyes and hang them above Wu's east gate, to observe the Yue bandits enter and extinguish Wu.''

sentences.zh: 乃自剄死。

translations.literal: Then self slit throat died.
translations.idiomatic: He then slit his own throat and died.

sentences.zh: 吳王聞之大怒，乃取子胥尸盛以鴟夷革，浮之江中。

translations.literal: Wu king heard greatly angered, took Wu Xi corpse contained with Chi Yi skin, floated on Jiang midst.
translations.idiomatic: The Wu king heard it and greatly angered. He took Wu Xi's corpse, contained it with Chi Yi skin, and floated it in the Jiang.

sentences.zh: 吳人憐之，為立祠於江上，因命曰胥山。

translations.literal: Wu people pitied him, established shrine on Jiang above, because named Xu Shan.
translations.idiomatic: The Wu people pitied him. They established a shrine above the Jiang and named it Xu Shan.

translations.literal: Wu grand steward Pi already with Wu Xi had enmity, because slandered: "Wu Xi character firm violent, little kindness, suspicious treacherous, his resentment fear become deep calamity. Former day king wished attack Qi, Wu Xi considered not can, king finally attacked had great merit. Wu Xi ashamed his plan strategy not used, then reversed resented. Now king again attack Qi, Wu Xi obstinate strong remonstrated, obstructed destroyed affairs, vainly hoped Wu defeat to self win his plan. Now king personally go, all state midst martial strength attack Qi, Wu Xi remonstrated not used, because stopped declined, pretended ill not go. King cannot not prepare, this raise calamity not difficult. Moreover Pi made person secretly spy him, his envoy to Qi, entrusted his son to Qi Bao clan. Being person minister, inner not content, outer relied feudal lords, self considered former king strategist, now not seen used, often vexed resented. Wish king early plan it." Wu king said: "Without your words, I also doubted it." Then sent envoy grant Wu Xi linked sword, said: "You with this die." Wu Xi gazed heaven sighed: "Alas! Slander minister Pi made chaos, king instead executed me. I made your father hegemon. From you not yet established, various princes contended establish, I with death contended for former king, almost not established. You having obtained establish, wished divide Wu state give me, I still dared not hope. However now you listen flatter minister words to kill elder." Then told his attendant: "Certainly plant my grave above with catalpa, make can become vessel; Dig out my eyes hang Wu east gate above, to observe Yue bandits enter extinguish Wu." Then self slit throat died. Wu king heard greatly angered, took Wu Xi corpse contained with Chi Yi skin, floated on Jiang midst. Wu people pitied him, established shrine on Jiang above, because named Xu Shan.

sentences.zh: 吳王既誅伍子胥，遂伐齊。

translations.literal: Wu king having executed Wu Xi, then attacked Qi.
translations.idiomatic: The Wu king, having executed Wu Zixu, then attacked Qi.

sentences.zh: 齊鮑氏殺其君悼公而立陽生。

translations.literal: Qi Bao clan killed their jun Dao Gong established Yang Sheng.
translations.idiomatic: The Qi Bao clan killed their ruler Duke Dao and established Yang Sheng.

sentences.zh: 吳王欲討其賊，不勝而去。

translations.literal: Wu king wished punish their traitor, not victorious departed.
translations.idiomatic: The Wu king wished to punish their traitor but was not victorious and departed.

sentences.zh: 其後二年，吳王召魯衛之君會之橐皋。

translations.literal: Its after two years, Wu king summoned Lu Wei jun assembled at Tuo Gao.
translations.idiomatic: Two years later, the Wu king summoned the rulers of Lu and Wei to assemble at Tuo Gao.

sentences.zh: 其明年，因北大會諸侯於黃池，以令周室。

translations.literal: Its next year, because north great assembled feudal lords at Huang Chi, to command Zhou house.
translations.idiomatic: The next year, he greatly assembled the feudal lords in the north at Huang Chi, to command the Zhou house.

sentences.zh: 越王句踐襲殺吳太子，破吳兵。

translations.literal: King Gou Jian of Yue suddenly killed Wu crown prince, broke Wu troops.
translations.idiomatic: King Goujian of Yue suddenly killed the Wu crown prince and broke the Wu troops.

sentences.zh: 吳王聞之，乃歸，使使厚幣與越平。

translations.literal: Wu king heard it, then returned, sent envoy thick gifts made peace with Yue.
translations.idiomatic: The Wu king heard it and then returned. He sent an envoy with thick gifts to make peace with Yue.

sentences.zh: 後九年，越王句踐遂滅吳，殺王夫差；

translations.literal: After nine years, King Gou Jian of Yue then extinguished Wu, killed king Fu Chai;
translations.idiomatic: After nine years, King Goujian of Yue then extinguished Wu and killed King Fu Chai;

sentences.zh: 而誅太宰嚭，以不忠於其君，而外受重賂，與己比周也。

translations.literal: Executed grand steward Pi, because not loyal to their jun, outer received heavy bribes, with self formed clique.
translations.idiomatic: he executed Grand Steward Pi, because he was not loyal to his ruler, received heavy bribes from outside, and formed a clique with him.

translations.literal: Wu king having executed Wu Xi, then attacked Qi. Qi Bao clan killed their jun Dao Gong established Yang Sheng. Wu king wished punish their traitor, not victorious departed. Its after two years, Wu king summoned Lu Wei jun assembled at Tuo Gao. Its next year, because north great assembled feudal lords at Huang Chi, to command Zhou house. King Gou Jian of Yue suddenly killed Wu crown prince, broke Wu troops. Wu king heard it, then returned, sent envoy thick gifts made peace with Yue. After nine years, King Gou Jian of Yue then extinguished Wu, killed king Fu Chai; Executed grand steward Pi, because not loyal to their jun, outer received heavy bribes, with self formed clique.

sentences.zh: 伍子胥初所與俱亡故楚太子建之子勝者，在於吳。

translations.literal: Wu Xi initially with together fled former Chu crown prince Jian son Sheng, at Wu.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Zixu initially fled together with the former Chu Crown Prince Jian's son Sheng, who was in Wu.

sentences.zh: 吳王夫差之時，楚惠王欲召勝歸楚。

translations.literal: Wu king Fu Chai time, Chu Hui Wang wished summon Sheng return Chu.
translations.idiomatic: During Wu King Fu Chai's time, Chu King Hui wished to summon Sheng to return to Chu.

sentences.zh: 葉公諫曰：「勝好勇而陰求死士，殆有私乎！」

translations.literal: Ye Gong remonstrated: "Sheng good brave secretly seek suicide troops, probably have private?"
translations.idiomatic: Ye Gong remonstrated: 'Sheng is good at bravery and secretly seeks suicide troops. Probably has private motives!'

sentences.zh: 惠王不聽。

translations.literal: Hui Wang not listened.
translations.idiomatic: King Hui did not listen.

sentences.zh: 遂召勝，使居楚之邊邑鄢，號為白公。

translations.literal: Then summoned Sheng, made dwell Chu border yi Yan, number called Bai Gong.
translations.idiomatic: He then summoned Sheng and made him dwell in Chu's border town Yan, with the title Bai Gong.

sentences.zh: 白公歸楚三年而吳誅子胥。

translations.literal: Bai Gong returned Chu three years Wu executed Xi.
translations.idiomatic: Three years after Bai Gong returned to Chu, Wu executed Zixu.

translations.literal: Wu Xi initially with together fled former Chu crown prince Jian son Sheng, at Wu. Wu king Fu Chai time, Chu Hui Wang wished summon Sheng return Chu. Ye Gong remonstrated: "Sheng good brave secretly seek suicide troops, probably have private?" Hui Wang not listened. Then summoned Sheng, made dwell Chu border yi Yan, number called Bai Gong. Bai Gong returned Chu three years Wu executed Xi.

sentences.zh: 白公勝既歸楚，怨鄭之殺其父，乃陰養死士求報鄭。

translations.literal: Bai Gong Sheng having returned Chu, resented Zheng killed his father, secretly nurtured suicide troops sought avenge Zheng.
translations.idiomatic: Bai Gong Sheng, having returned to Chu, resented that Zheng had killed his father. He secretly nurtured suicide troops to seek revenge against Zheng.

sentences.zh: 歸楚五年，請伐鄭，楚令尹子西許之。

translations.literal: Returned Chu five years, requested attack Zheng, Chu prime minister Zi Xi permitted.
translations.idiomatic: Five years after returning to Chu, he requested to attack Zheng. Chu's prime minister Zi Xi permitted it.

sentences.zh: 兵未發而晉伐鄭，鄭請救於楚。

translations.literal: Troops not issued Jin attacked Zheng, Zheng requested aid from Chu.
translations.idiomatic: The troops had not yet been issued when Jin attacked Zheng. Zheng requested aid from Chu.

sentences.zh: 楚使子西往救，與盟而還。

translations.literal: Chu sent Zi Xi go save, allied returned.
translations.idiomatic: Chu sent Zi Xi to go save them. He allied with Zheng and returned.

sentences.zh: 白公勝怒曰：「非鄭之仇，乃子西也。」

translations.literal: Bai Gong Sheng angered: "Not Zheng enmity, Zi Xi."
translations.idiomatic: Bai Gong Sheng was angered and said: 'It is not Zheng that is the enemy, but Zi Xi.'

sentences.zh: 勝自礪劍，人問曰：「何以為？」

translations.literal: Sheng self sharpened sword, people asked: "What for?"
translations.idiomatic: Sheng personally sharpened his sword. People asked: 'What is it for?'

sentences.zh: 勝曰：「欲以殺子西。」

translations.literal: Sheng said: "Wish kill Zi Xi."
translations.idiomatic: Sheng said: 'I wish to kill Zi Xi with it.'

sentences.zh: 子西聞之，笑曰：「勝如卵耳，何能為也。」

translations.literal: Zi Xi heard, laughed: "Sheng like egg, what able do."
translations.idiomatic: Zi Xi heard it and laughed, saying: 'Sheng is like an egg. What can he do?'

translations.literal: Bai Gong Sheng having returned Chu, resented Zheng killed his father, secretly nurtured suicide troops sought avenge Zheng. Returned Chu five years, requested attack Zheng, Chu prime minister Zi Xi permitted. Troops not issued Jin attacked Zheng, Zheng requested aid from Chu. Chu sent Zi Xi go save, allied returned. Bai Gong Sheng angered: "Not Zheng enmity, Zi Xi." Sheng self sharpened sword, people asked: "What for?" Sheng said: "Wish kill Zi Xi." Zi Xi heard, laughed: "Sheng like egg, what able do."

sentences.zh: 其後四歲，白公勝與石乞襲殺楚令尹子西、司馬子綦於朝。

translations.literal: Its after four years, Bai Gong Sheng with Shi Qi suddenly killed Chu prime minister Zi Xi, commander Zi Qi at court.
translations.idiomatic: Four years later, Bai Gong Sheng and Shi Qi suddenly assassinated Chu's prime minister Zi Xi and commander Zi Qi at court.

sentences.zh: 石乞曰：「不殺王，不可。」

translations.literal: Shi Qi said: "Not kill king, cannot."
translations.idiomatic: Shi Qi said: 'If we do not kill the king, it cannot be.'

sentences.zh: 乃劫（之）王如高府。

translations.literal: Then coerced king like Gao Fu.
translations.idiomatic: They then coerced the king to the Gao residence.

sentences.zh: 石乞從者屈固負楚惠王亡走昭夫人之宮。

translations.literal: Shi Qi follower Qu Gu carried Chu Hui Wang fled went Zhao Fu Ren palace.
translations.idiomatic: Shi Qi's follower Qu Gu carried Chu King Hui on his back and fled to the Zhao lady's palace.

sentences.zh: 葉公聞白公為亂，率其國人攻白公。

translations.literal: Ye Gong heard Bai Gong made chaos, led his state people attacked Bai Gong.
translations.idiomatic: Ye Gong heard that Bai Gong had made chaos. He led his state's people to attack Bai Gong.

sentences.zh: 白公之徒敗，亡走山中，自殺。

translations.literal: Bai Gong followers defeated, fled mountain midst, committed suicide.
translations.idiomatic: Bai Gong's followers were defeated. They fled into the mountains and committed suicide.

sentences.zh: 而虜石乞，而問白公尸處，不言將亨。

translations.literal: Captured Shi Qi, questioned Bai Gong corpse place, not speak would boil.
translations.idiomatic: They captured Shi Qi and questioned him about Bai Gong's corpse location. If he did not speak, they would boil him.

sentences.zh: 石乞曰：「事成為卿，不成而亨，固其職也。」

translations.literal: Shi Qi said: "Affair become qing, not become boil, certainly its duty."
translations.idiomatic: Shi Qi said: 'If the affair succeeds, you will be a qing; if it does not succeed and I am boiled, it is certainly my duty.'

sentences.zh: 終不肯告其尸處。

translations.literal: Finally not consented tell his corpse place.
translations.idiomatic: He finally would not consent to tell Bai Gong's corpse location.

sentences.zh: 遂亨石乞，而求惠王復立之。

translations.literal: Then boiled Shi Qi, sought Hui Wang again established him.
translations.idiomatic: They then boiled Shi Qi and sought to have King Hui established again.

translations.literal: Its after four years, Bai Gong Sheng with Shi Qi suddenly killed Chu prime minister Zi Xi, commander Zi Qi at court. Shi Qi said: "Not kill king, cannot." Then coerced king like Gao Fu. Shi Qi follower Qu Gu carried Chu Hui Wang fled went Zhao Fu Ren palace. Ye Gong heard Bai Gong made chaos, led his state people attacked Bai Gong. Bai Gong followers defeated, fled mountain midst, committed suicide. Captured Shi Qi, questioned Bai Gong corpse place, not speak would boil. Shi Qi said: "Affair become qing, not become boil, certainly its duty." Finally not consented tell his corpse place. Then boiled Shi Qi, sought Hui Wang again established him.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：怨毒之於人甚矣哉！

translations.literal: Grand Historian said: Resentment poison at people extreme!
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Historian said: How extreme resentment and poison are to people!

sentences.zh: 王者尚不能行之於臣下，況同列乎！

translations.literal: Wang still cannot practice at ministers subordinates, moreover same rank!
translations.idiomatic: Even wang cannot practice it on their ministers and subordinates—how much less on those of the same rank!

sentences.zh: 向令伍子胥從奢俱死，何異螻蟻。

translations.literal: Towards made Wu Xi follow She together die, what different ant.
translations.idiomatic: If Wu Zixu had followed She and died together, how would he be different from an ant?

sentences.zh: 棄小義，雪大恥，名垂於後世，悲夫！

translations.literal: Abandon small righteousness, avenge great humiliation, name hang at later generations, sad!
translations.idiomatic: He abandoned small righteousness, avenged great humiliation, and his name hangs in later generations. How sad!

sentences.zh: 方子胥窘於江上，道乞食，志豈嘗須臾忘郢邪？

translations.literal: When Wu Xi distressed on Jiang above, path begged food, ambition how once moment forgot Ying?
translations.idiomatic: When Wu Xi was distressed on the Jiang above, begging for food along the path, how could his ambition even for a moment forget Ying?

sentences.zh: 故隱忍就功名，非烈丈夫孰能致此哉？

translations.literal: Therefore concealed endured achieved merit name, not fierce husband who able reach this?
translations.idiomatic: Therefore, he concealed and endured to achieve merit and name. Who among fierce husbands could reach this?

sentences.zh: 白公如不自立為君者，其功謀亦不可勝道者哉！

translations.literal: Bai Gong if not self established as jun, his merit plans also cannot all say!
translations.idiomatic: If Bai Gong had not established himself as jun, his merits and plans also could not all be told!

translations.literal: Grand Historian said: Resentment poison at people extreme! Wang still cannot practice at ministers subordinates, moreover same rank! Towards made Wu Xi follow She together die, what different ant. Abandon small righteousness, avenge great humiliation, name hang at later generations, sad! When Wu Xi distressed on Jiang above, path begged food, ambition how once moment forgot Ying? Therefore concealed endured achieved merit name, not fierce husband who able reach this? Bai Gong if not self established as jun, his merit plans also cannot all say!
